title: The 35th Annual William A. Dwiggins Lecture
content:
Hermann Zapf at 90: An Assessment by Matthew Carter and Jerry Kelly, introduced by Society of Printers president Scott-Martin Kosofsky. At Rabb Auditorium, Boston Public Library, Copley Square, Boston. Tuesday, April 21, 2009, 6:00 p.m. Admission is free--be there!
